content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 units of stone. Now that I have both stone and wood, I can craft a stone furnace.

# The recipe for a stone furnace requires 5 units of stone. Since I have 10 units of stone, I can proceed to craft the stone furnace.

craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Crafting one stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after crafting. 

# After crafting the stone furnace, I will place it down and fuel it with wood to smelt the iron ore into iron plates. 
# Then I will insert the iron ore into the furnace for smelting.
furnace_position = (0, 0)  # Placeholder position for placing the furnace; adjust as necessary.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the furnace at the specified position.
insert_item(Prototype.Wood, furnace_position, quantity=4)  # Fuel the furnace with wood.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace_position, quantity=10)  # Insert iron ore into the furnace for smelting.

print(f"Furnace placed at {furnace_position}. Smelting iron ore into iron plates...")
